en.title: **Full-Stack Development Intern**
en.text: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to enhance application functionality and performance. Collaborated on frontend development, ensuring a responsive and user-friendly UI/UX.

en.title: **Software Development Intern (AWS)**
en.text: Contributing to the backend architecture of cloud-native applications using AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and other AWS services. Focused on building scalable, serverless functions, API integrations, and infrastructure optimization. Actively involved in writing modular backend logic and ensuring high availability across deployments.
